Setup

This application is easy to use.

API Query

You can simply get a URL to get data.

For example, you have an instance with UUID('7e505667-83f4-4f32-9c01-f05f693b82c7')

You can get the data by following the URL:

http://yoursite.com/api/getInstance/7e505667-83f4-4f32-9c01-f05f693b82c7/<species>

Species

You can custom the data you get from the server.

Species are separated by '|' like name|version|force

Species Description
name the instance's name
version the current version of the instance
force If the version is forced to update to a new version
views How many times the API is requested
link The download link of the new version
announcement Instance's announcement
update Update log
md5 Update installer's md5

Return Value

The return value is in JSON format like:


{
"uuid": "2e0f0422-3054-440d-ac81-84417961b157", # UUID of the instance
"species": [ # List of species
"name",
"version",
"force",
"views",
"link",
"announcement",
"update",
"md5"
],
"result": { # Result of the instance
"name": "test",
"version": "0.0.0",
"force": false,
"views": 19,
"link": "",
"announcement": "",
"update": "",
"md5": ""
}
} {% endblock content %}
